org.apache.james.imap.message.response.imap4rev1.server
Class STATUSResponse

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.james.imap.message.response.imap4rev1.server.STATUSResponse
All Implemented Interfaces:
ImapMessage, ImapResponseMessage
public class STATUSResponse
extends java.lang.Object
implements ImapResponseMessage

Represents a STATUS response. See RFC3501 7.2.4.
